title: authenticate user with valid credentials
description: Test the /auth/token POST endpoint to verify that a user can successfully authenticate with valid username and password, receiving a 200 success response and a valid token.

title: get shoes list with brand and gender filters
description: Test the /shoes GET endpoint to retrieve a list of shoes filtered by brandId and gender query parameters, ensuring correct filtering and response format.

title: add item to cart with valid variant and quantity
description: Test the /cart POST endpoint to add a shoe variant to the shopping cart with a specified quantity, verifying the cart updates correctly and persists the session.

title: create order with valid shipping and payment method
description: Test the /orders/create POST endpoint to create a new order with valid shipping address and payment method, ensuring order is created with status CREATED and proper authorization is enforced.

title: cancel order with valid order id and status
description: Test the /orders/{orderId}/cancel POST endpoint to cancel an order that is in a cancellable status (CREATED or CONFIRMED), verifying the order status updates correctly and authorization is enforced.

title: get orders by username with authorization
description: Test the /order-details/user/{username} GET endpoint to retrieve all orders for a specific user, ensuring the response includes correct order data and access control is enforced.

title: update order status with valid status transition
description: Test the /order-details/order/{orderId} PUT endpoint to update the status of an order, verifying that only valid state transitions are allowed and unauthorized transitions are rejected.

title: register new user with valid data
description: Test the /users POST endpoint to register a new user with valid user details, ensuring the user is created successfully and validation rules are enforced.

title: create payment with valid order and amount
description: Test the /payment/create POST endpoint to initiate a VNPay payment for a given order with a valid amount and optional bank code, verifying payment creation and authorization.

title: handle payment callback with valid secure hash
description: Test the /payment/payment-callback POST endpoint to process VNPay payment callbacks, verifying that the secure hash is validated and payment status is updated accordingly.
